acknowledgementPoints.bySubmitting: By submitting this form, you acknowledge and agree to the following:

transferPage.failedToLoadData: Failed to load transfer data. Please try again later.

transferPage.errorDescription: There was an error processing your transfer. Please try again.
transferPage.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

transferConfirmationDialog.title: Transfer to Current Account Wallet
transferConfirmationDialog.subtitle: Confirm Transfer
transferConfirmationDialog.transferMessage: You are about to transfer {{amount}} {{currency}} to your Current Account Wallet
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer1: Please ensure all details and amounts are correct before confirming the transaction. Once submitted, transactions cannot be reversed.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer2: Transfers may be subject to delays due to network availability, processing time, or external factors beyond our control.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer3: Applicable transaction fees, exchange rates, and processing charges will be displayed before confirmation (if any).
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer4: All transactions are encrypted for security. For added protection, please do not share your login credentials with others.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer5: Lookcard Limited is not liable for incorrect details entered by the user.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer6: Transactions may be reviewed in compliance with local and international anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) regulations. This may lead to processing delays or cancellations.

transferSuccessDialog.title: Transfer Successful
transferSuccessDialog.description: Your transfer has been completed successfully.

recruitAgentPage.enterEmail: Please enter your registered email address in lookcard.io platform account
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem1: I confirm that all information provided in this form is accurate and true to the best of my knowledge.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem2: I acknowledge that the person I am referring has given their consent to be contacted by Lookcard Limited regarding this program.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem3: I understand that submitting a referral does not guarantee acceptance into the program for the referred individual.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem4: I acknowledge that any benefits or rewards for this referral are subject to the referred individual meeting the program eligibility and joining requirement.
recruitAgentPage.agreementLabel: I agree to all the terms stated above, including compliance with the program requirements, ethical conduct, and privacy policies. I confirm that I understand and accept these terms for both my application and any referrals I submit.

termsDialog.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENT
termsDialog.subtitle: Please read and agree to the following terms and conditions.
termsDialog.terms: By submitting this registration form, I confirm that the information provided is true, accurate, and complete. I agree to comply with the LookCard Community Partnership Program terms and conditions and understand that my participation is subject to approval. I acknowledge that commissions and incentives are based on my reseller tier and performance. I consent to LookCard collecting, processing, and storing my information for verification, program administration, and commission payouts in accordance with its Privacy Policy. I also understand that LookCard reserves the right to update program terms, and it is my responsibility to stay informed about any changes.
termsDialog.termsAdditional1: I acknowledge that commissions and incentives are based on my reseller tier and performance. I consent to LookCard collecting, processing, and storing my information for verification, program administration, and commission payouts in accordance with its Privacy Policy.
termsDialog.termsAdditional2: I also understand that LookCard reserves the right to update program terms, and it is my responsibility to stay informed about any changes.
